citations.narrative:
There were no records indicating the date(s) the canine parvovirus and distemper vaccines were last administered to the
adult dogs. Failure to maintain names and dates of all vaccines and treatments administered makes it difficult to evaluate
when these vaccines were last given. Licensee must ensure that records are maintained for all vaccines and treatments
administered and the dates of administration. Correct by February 17, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(b)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
There were no records indicating the date(s) the canine parvovirus and distemper vaccines were last administered to the 
adult dogs. Failure to maintain names and dates of all vaccines and treatments administered makes it difficult to evaluate 
when these vaccines were last given. Licensee must ensure that records are maintained for all vaccines and treatments 
administered and the dates of administration. Correct by February 17, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
